reviewText:
Nenah is a very nice person and has a calm voice, which is the most important thing; nervous people are not good teachers.

Her instructions are all correct; I have now made two sweaters and working on the third. After learning via video, it also includes written instructions.

I also like that you can email her and ask questions and actually get a response!

Very well done DVD.  Am looking forward to purchasing Nenah's "two at a time socks" DVD.
